335170.name: Potatoman OST & Supporter Pack
335170.description:
*UPDATE* Supporter Pack added - artwork, wallpapers, humor and TONS OF GIFs added! Find them in the Goodies folder under Local Files for the game.

The Official Soundtrack For Potatoman Seeks the Troof. Contains 2 extra tracks not found in the game. Also available on Edison Wax Cylinder.

All tracks written by Miles Tilmann. Additional production on certain tracks by Mark DeNardo.
